resources.string: Make sure that you have a backup of this wallet.

Since only you control your money, you\'ll need to save a backup of your keystore in case this app is deleted.\n\nYour wallet is never saved to cloud storage or standard device backups.
Keep a copy of your wallet to keep it safe.
Please unlock your Android device to continue.
Did you successfully make a backup?
Any \'rooted\' app can access AppCoins Wallet\'s keychain data and steal your wallet! Wipe this wallet immediately and restore on a secure device.

The higher the gas price, the more expensive your transaction fee will be, but the quicker your transaction will be processed by the Ethereum network.
The gas limit prevents smart contracts from consuming all your Ethereum. We will try to calculate the gas limit automatically for you, but some smart contracts may require a custom gas limit.

We forked the Trust Wallet for Android project to bootstrap the AppCoins wallet development. We considered it the best alternative regarding already implemented functionalities. We forked it with the intention of contributing back with implementations and work that would be considered relevant.

Ethereum is the cryptocurrency that AppCoins are based on. You can buy and sell them in most exchanges, it\'s very popular!
AppCoins is the cryptocurrency for the app economy. You can buy and sell it on several exchanges and use it to purchase in-app items.
The token to buy in-app items! Top up AppCoins Credits from your wallet or get them for free by using apps. They can also be transferred between friends!

Your AppCoins Credits balance is blocked

Due to an unusual transaction history, your AppCoins Credits balance was blocked. You\'ll still be able to make payments and transaction with other methods except AppCoins Credits.\n\nIf you believe this is a mistake, contact us at:

\"The Earth is what we all have in common\" ‚Äì Wendell Berry
\"That\'s one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind\" ‚Äì Neil Armstrong
\"I would like to die on Mars. Just not on impact.\" ‚Äì Elon Musk
\"Everyone is a moon, and has a dark side which he never shows to anybody.\" ‚Äì Mark Twain
\"All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them...\" ‚Äì Galileo Galilei
\"If you find life on Europa, what would you call it? Would it be, like, Europeans?\" ‚Äì Neil DeGrasse Tyson
\"The scientific theory I like best is that the rings of Saturn are composed entirely of lost airline luggage.\" ‚Äì Mark Russell
\"I\'m sure the universe is full of intelligent life. It\'s just been too intelligent to come here.\" ‚Äì Arthur C.Clarke
\"The moons of Uranus seem to have got a twist.\" ‚Äì Sir Robert Stawell Ball
\"That star is not on the chart!\" ‚Äì Heinrich d\'Arrest upon discovering Neptune.
\"Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known\" ‚Äì Carl Sagan

AppCoins is a digital token created by Aptoide and used by more than 200 million users worldwide. The main goal of this innovative payment solution is to provide trust in the apps economy and to remove intermediaries.
Like all digital tokens, AppCoins value changes constantly in relation to your preferred currency (EUR, USD...). You can track these changes over time in the graphic above.

Both AppCoins and AppCoins Credits can be used to make payments in your favorite apps. You\'ll receive AppCoins Credits as a bonus when making a purchase with any other payment method (bank card, PayPal...) and also when topping up your AppCoins Wallet.
